product_name: MUK LUKS Ribbed Scuff Slippers - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Keep your feet cozy warm when you're lounging around the house on cold winter days with the MUK LUKS Ribbed Scuff Slippers. Polyester suede and knit uppers are lined with soft polyester with a plaid print for great style and comfort. Thermoplastic elastomer outsoles are suitable for light outdoor use. Special buy.
short_description: Keep your feet cozy warm when you're lounging around the house on cold winter days with the MUK LUKS Ribbed Scuff Slippers.
